name: George GORSO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Gorso v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: Justice Baldwin did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: George GORSO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2006, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice Baldwin did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
